title: Creekridge Capital Grows Sales Team With Four New Hires
text:
Creekridge Capital Grows Sales Team With Four New Hires August 19, 2015, 07:17 AM Related: Creekridge Capital 
Creekridge Capital announced they have added four Sales Managers to their team. Melissa Scott and Patrick O'Kane have been added to their Healthcare Sales Channel. Jason Gerdes and Cathy Acciarito have been added to their Direct Sales Channel.Ms. Scott and Mr. O'Kane have joined Creekridge as Regional Sales Managers and will report to Jason Koby, SVP of Sales at Creekridge. They are responsible for targeting, implementing and growing vendor partnerships for Creekridge's healthcare sales channel. Ms. Scott will lead sales for Creekridge's southeastern region and will work out of Creekridge's North Carolina office. Mr. O'Kane will lead sales for Creekridge's southwest region and will work out of Creekridge's home office in Minnesota.Mr. Gerdes and Ms. Acciarito have joined Creekridge as Direct Sales Managers and will report to Dave Gnade, EVP of Sales at Creekridge. They will be responsible for providing custom financial solutions for direct customers. Mr. Gerdes will work out of Creekridge's Ohio office and Ms. Acciarito will work out of Creekridge's Philadelphia office."These four individuals are proven sales leaders and we are excited to have them join our team," stated Mr. Gnade. "Their leadership and experience will be beneficial as we continue to grow our sales channels." Most Popular
